name: Corpsplosion
description:
You've found yourself in a hopeless situation - pits of lava and ledges too tall to grab. If only you could somehow launch yourself...

Made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 96.

Credits:

WackyIdeas (wackyideas.itch.io) - Programming

Linachuwu (linachuwu.itch.io) - Backgrounds and UI

WizardDev1234 (wizarddev1234.itch.io) - Tiles and character

Music - Kevin Macleod (Pixelland) and Joshua McLean (Mountain Trials)
